typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		movie as integer,
		title as string,
		genres as string,
		year as integer,
		Rating as integer,
		{Rotton Tomato} as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> source1
source1 derive(moviestruct = (movieId=(movieId=toInteger(movie),
		title=title,
		year=toInteger(year)))) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['myjson.json'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sink1
